Vincia: activity diagrams annotations grammar
Last Published: 02 June 2013  

Description (Functions / Class Methods)

For the description of functions or class methods, we keep the doxygen format (Qt-like recommended). Consult the relevant section in Doxygen's documentation.

annotation

 
        //! Brief description. 
        /*! Detailed description
            starts here. 
        */
        type function/method(args){
        ...
        }
		
        ----------
		
        //! Brief description.

        //! Detailed description 
        //! starts here.
        type function/method(args){
        ...
        }

representation in the diagram

Next to the function/method title, in an information panel.
